pullRequest.title: Create new roles GROUPOBSERVER, RESOURCEOBSERVER, and FACILITYOBSERVER
pullRequest.bodyText:
I created three new roles, which should serve as observing variant for Group admin, Resource admin and Facility admin.
For Group observer I also had to edit method "addAllSubgroupsToAuthzRoles", where are some more privilege settings for Group admin.

nodes.bodyText: I think this could be done without such a duplicate of the existing code. The only change is the role itself here.
I know that it is not your change but can you add also the TRUSTEDFACILITYADMIN role to this class?
